oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Towards more ecoefficient food production: MFA approach
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Risku-Norja, H.
Mäenpää, I.
Koikkalainen, K.
Rikkonen, P.
Vanhala, P.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The food flux comprises four mutually linked loops: 1)plant production, 2)livestock husbandry, 3) food processing industry and 4) human consumption. In the present paper MFA approach has been used to describe the system. A general framework and practical solutions for estimating and balancing the materials flow are outlined. The focus in this paper is agriculture.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Risku-Norja, H.; Mäenpää, I.; Koikkalainen, K.; Rikkonen, P. and Vanhala, P. (2004) Towards more ecoefficient food production: MFA approach. In: (Pre)Proceedings of the 6th European IFSA symposium, pp. 805-814.
